content.raw:
Looks good. Two questions:

- Do we think teams will want to customize the update rate? I think we should at least document somewhere in the tutorials that we throttle the update rate to 50Hz to mimic the latency goal for the real hand.
- Do we have any sense of what the maximum update rate we can drive the hand to? If we think teams will want to change the update rate, we should give an upper bound on the highest update rate handsim can handle.
content.html:
Looks good. Two questions:

  • Do we think teams will want to customize the update rate? I think we should at least document somewhere in the tutorials that we throttle the update rate to 50Hz to mimic the latency goal for the real hand.
  • Do we have any sense of what the maximum update rate we can drive the hand to? If we think teams will want to change the update rate, we should give an upper bound on the highest update rate handsim can handle.
